actor_awards.notes: Known as the King of Rock and Roll. He starred in 31 narrative feature films and two theatrical documentaries. The documentary Elvis on Tour won a Golden Globe. He was inducted into multiple music halls of fame.

filmography.title: Jailhouse Rock
filmography.role_description: A construction worker convicted of manslaughter who learns to play guitar in prison and becomes a rock and roll star upon his release.
filmography.plot: After serving time for manslaughter, young Vince Everett becomes a teenage rock star.

filmography.title: King Creole
filmography.role_description: A young man in New Orleans who gets mixed up with gangsters while trying to make a living as a nightclub singer.
filmography.plot: A young man finds his music career threatened by organized crime in New Orleans.

filmography.title: Love Me Tender
filmography.role_description: The youngest of the Reno brothers who stays home during the Civil War and marries his older brother's girlfriend, believing him to be dead.
filmography.plot: A Confederate team is ordered to rob a Union payroll train but the war ends just before the robbery, leading to internal conflict.

filmography.title: Blue Hawaii
filmography.role_description: A soldier returning home to Hawaii who defies his parents' wishes for him to work in the family fruit business, preferring to be a tour guide.
filmography.plot: After arriving back in Hawaii from the Army, Chad Gates defies his parents' wishes for him to work at the family business and instead goes to work as a tour guide.
filmography.awards: Writers Guild of America: Nomination - Best Written American Musical

filmography.title: Flaming Star
filmography.role_description: The biracial son of a white rancher and a Kiowa mother who is torn between two cultures when war breaks out.
filmography.plot: Caught between two cultures, Pacer Burton, the son of a white rancher and his Kiowa wife, is drawn into the war between the settlers and the natives.

filmography.title: Viva Las Vegas
filmography.role_description: A race car driver who heads to Las Vegas to win the Grand Prix but needs to raise money for a new engine while romancing a swimming instructor.
filmography.plot: Race car driver Lucky Jackson goes to Las Vegas to earn money to pay for a new engine for his motor car.

filmography.title: Loving You
filmography.role_description: A delivery man who is discovered by a music publicist and country musician, launching him to stardom in a semi-biographical role.
filmography.plot: A small-town delivery boy is discovered by a publicist and a country singer, who turn him into a rock and roll sensation.

filmography.title: Wild in the Country
filmography.role_description: A troubled young man with a talent for writing who is given a second chance by a sympathetic psychiatrist.
filmography.plot: A rebellious young man with a literary talent is given a chance to redeem himself by a court-appointed psychiatrist.

filmography.title: G.I. Blues
filmography.role_description: A soldier stationed in West Germany who dreams of opening a nightclub and accepts a bet to date a cabaret dancer.
filmography.plot: An American soldier stationed in Germany bets his friends that he can date a beautiful cabaret dancer who is known for being ice cold.

filmography.title: Follow That Dream
filmography.role_description: A naive and simple-minded young man who homesteads on a Florida beach with his vagabond family, fighting off gamblers and officials.
filmography.plot: A vagabond family homesteads on a Florida beach, battling local officials, gamblers, and social workers.

filmography.title: Kid Galahad
filmography.role_description: A mechanic and amateur boxer who gets involved with a gambling promoter while trying to maintain his integrity.
filmography.plot: A boxing promoter takes a young mechanic under his wing, training him to become a prizefighter.

filmography.title: Charro!
filmography.role_description: A former outlaw who tries to go straight but is framed for the theft of a cannon by his old gang. The only film where Presley does not sing on screen.
filmography.plot: A former outlaw is framed by his old gang for the theft of a Mexican cannon and must clear his name.

filmography.title: Change of Habit
filmography.role_description: A doctor running a clinic in a rough neighborhood who falls for a woman who is secretly a nun.
filmography.plot: Three nuns go undercover in a rough neighborhood to help the community, and one of them falls for a local doctor.

filmography.title: Roustabout
filmography.role_description: A tough, wandering musician who takes a job at a struggling carnival and clashes with the owner.
filmography.plot: A musician takes a job with a traveling carnival and brings new life to the show while romance blossoms.

filmography.title: Girls! Girls! Girls!
filmography.role_description: A fisherman who moonlights as a nightclub singer to buy a sailboat, caught in a love triangle.
filmography.plot: A Hawaiian fisherman who loves his life at sea is forced to sing in a nightclub to buy the boat his father built.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination - Best Motion Picture - Musical or Comedy

filmography.title: Fun in Acapulco
filmography.role_description: A former trapeze artist working as a lifeguard and singer in Mexico to escape a tragic past.
filmography.plot: A trapeze artist who is afraid of heights works as a lifeguard and singer in Acapulco, finding romance and rivalry.

filmography.title: It Happened at the World's Fair
filmography.role_description: A crop duster pilot who goes to the Seattle World's Fair to earn money to reclaim his plane.
filmography.plot: A crop dusting pilot and his partner travel to the Seattle World's Fair, where the pilot ends up taking care of a lost little girl.

filmography.title: Kissin' Cousins
filmography.role_description: A dual role playing a dark-haired Air Force officer and his blonde hillbilly cousin.
filmography.plot: An Air Force officer tries to convince his hillbilly relatives to allow a missile site to be built on their land.

filmography.title: Girl Happy
filmography.role_description: A band leader hired by a Chicago mobster to chaperone his daughter during spring break in Fort Lauderdale.
filmography.plot: A rock and roll singer and his band are hired to keep an eye on a mobster's daughter during spring break.

filmography.title: Spinout
filmography.role_description: A singer and race car driver who is pursued by three different women wanting to marry him.
filmography.plot: A race car driver who also sings in a band tries to avoid the altar while juggling three beautiful women.

filmography.title: Frankie and Johnny
filmography.role_description: A riverboat gambler and performer who gets involved in a superstitious romance.
filmography.plot: A riverboat singer and gambler tries to change his luck and his girlfriend's jealousy.

filmography.title: Live a Little, Love a Little
filmography.role_description: A photographer who tries to juggle two full-time jobs and a quirky woman who complicates his life.
filmography.plot: A photographer tries to balance two jobs and a woman who refuses to leave him alone.

filmography.title: The Trouble with Girls
filmography.role_description: The manager of a traveling Chautauqua company in the 1920s who gets involved in a murder mystery.
filmography.plot: The manager of a traveling show gets involved in a local murder investigation in a small town.

filmography.title: Stay Away, Joe
filmography.role_description: A Native American rodeo rider who returns to his reservation to help his family raise cattle.
filmography.plot: A half-Native American rodeo champion returns to the reservation to help his people raise cattle, but antics ensue.

filmography.title: Speedway
filmography.role_description: A generous race car driver who owes back taxes and falls for the IRS agent sent to audit him.
filmography.plot: A race car driver creates a tax problem for himself and falls in love with the IRS agent assigned to his case.

filmography.title: Clambake
filmography.role_description: A wealthy heir who switches places with a water-ski instructor to see if girls will like him for himself.
filmography.plot: A millionaire's son trades places with a water-ski instructor to find a girl who will love him for himself, not his money.

filmography.title: Easy Come, Easy Go
filmography.role_description: A Navy frogman who discovers a sunken treasure and tries to retrieve it after leaving the service.
filmography.plot: A Navy frogman discovers a treasure chest in a sunken ship and works to retrieve it upon his discharge.

filmography.title: Elvis: That's the Way It Is
filmography.role_description: Himself in a documentary covering his return to live performances in Las Vegas.
filmography.plot: A documentary film that chronicles Elvis Presley's Summer Festival in Las Vegas during August 1970.

filmography.title: Elvis on Tour
filmography.role_description: Himself in a documentary following his 1972 tour.
filmography.plot: A documentary following Elvis Presley on a 15-city tour of the United States in April 1972.

filmography.title: Harum Scarum
filmography.role_description: An American movie star who is kidnapped while visiting the Middle East and becomes involved in an assassination plot.
filmography.plot: An American movie star is kidnapped in the Middle East and becomes involved in a plot to assassinate a king.

filmography.title: Tickle Me
filmography.role_description: A rodeo rider who takes a job at a beauty spa and hunts for hidden gold.
filmography.plot: A rodeo star takes a job at a weight-loss spa/beauty ranch and helps the owner find a hidden fortune.
